statements: SELECT * FROM digital_assets_metadata;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM digital_assets_metadata;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_description FROM digital_assets_metadata WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT * FROM digital_assets_metadata WHERE blockchain_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT asset_name, asset_description FROM digital_assets_metadata ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_assets_metadata WHERE asset_type = 'image' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_description FROM digital_assets_metadata WHERE blockchain_id = 'ethereum' ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_assets_metadata WHERE asset_type = 'document' AND blockchain_id = 'eos' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT asset_id, asset_type FROM digital_assets_metadata WHERE asset_name LIKE '%logo%' OR asset_description LIKE '%brand%' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_description, blockchain_id FROM digital_assets_metadata WHERE asset_type IN ('video', 'audio') ORDER BY blockchain_id, asset_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM digital_assets ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_owner FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Image';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT record_id, block_hash, block_number FROM blockchain_records WHERE block_number > 1000;
SELECT * FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT asset_name, asset_owner FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT asset_name, asset_creation_date FROM digital_assets ORDER BY asset_creation_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM digital_assets;
SELECT da.asset_name, br.block_number FROM digital_assets da INNER JOIN blockchain_records br ON da.asset_id = br.asset_id WHERE br.block_number > 100 ORDER BY br.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_asset_metadata;
SELECT asset_name, asset_description FROM digital_asset_metadata WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, upload_date FROM digital_asset_metadata WHERE asset_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM asset_tags WHERE tag_name = 'finance' ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT asset_id, category_name FROM asset_categories WHERE category_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM digital_asset_metadata ORDER BY upload_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT asset_name, asset_description FROM digital_asset_metadata WHERE asset_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM digital_asset_metadata WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT asset_name, tag_name FROM digital_asset_metadata INNER JOIN asset_tags ON digital_asset_metadata.asset_id = asset_tags.asset_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(asset_id) AS total_assets FROM asset_categories GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_assets DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM digital_assets;
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM asset_metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT tag_name FROM asset_tags WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT search_term, search_timestamp FROM search_history ORDER BY search_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM asset_metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT asset_name, tag_name FROM digital_assets JOIN asset_tags ON digital_assets.asset_id = asset_tags.asset_id WHERE tag_name = 'nature' AND asset_name LIKE '%mountain%' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT search_term, search_timestamp FROM search_history WHERE search_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY search_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT asset_type FROM digital_assets ORDER BY asset_type;
SELECT * FROM digital_assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT * FROM asset_metadata WHERE metadata_key = 'author';
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM asset_owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT tag_name FROM asset_tags WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM digital_assets ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM digital_assets WHERE blockchain_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT asset_name, metadata_key, metadata_value FROM digital_assets INNER JOIN asset_metadata ON digital_assets.asset_id = asset_metadata.asset_id WHERE metadata_key='author';
SELECT asset_name, tag_name FROM digital_assets INNER JOIN asset_tags ON digital_assets.asset_id = asset_tags.asset_id WHERE tag_name='art';
SELECT asset_name, owner_name, owner_address FROM digital_assets INNER JOIN asset_owners ON digital_assets.asset_id = asset_owners.asset_id WHERE owner_name LIKE '%Smith%';
